scripts.start: npx concurrently "yarn --cwd remote-app start" "yarn --cwd host-app dev"
scripts.e2e:ci: yarn start & npx wait-on http-get://localhost:3000/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../cypress/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../cypress/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/runAll*.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
